sentences.en: With both countries experiencing economic revolutions, it might be time to redraw the traditional relationship.
sentences.cn: 随着两国经济改革的进展，这可能是重新规划传统关系的良机。

sentences.en: So now we'll redraw this as zero.
sentences.cn: 现在我们把这个重新画为零。

sentences.en: And he intends to redraw it himself.
sentences.cn: 并且，他打算亲自重新绘制。
